name: Kalimantan Forest Conservation SPV â€” Series 1
description: This SPV finances and owns a protected rainforest conservation project in Kalimantan, Indonesia. Investor capital funds land protection, community programs, and monitoring operations. Investors hold registered participation rights in the SPV and receive distributions from project revenues, including carbon credit sales.

attributes.value: Registered participation in SPV ownership and revenue distributions
Protected rainforest land and conservation project operations
Sale of verified carbon credits and conservation grants
Verra VCS + CCB Gold + BeZero A-rated
